links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part One
The Tale of the Sun and Moon

wikitext.*:
{{expansion}}
'''Ilinsor''' was a [[Vala]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. He was a ''[[Sylphs|Súru]]'', one of the servants of [[Manwë]] and [[Varda]], and later chosen as a steersman of the [[Moon]] for [[Silmo]] could not do it. The greater brightness of the Sun made him envious, therefore he chased the stars.<ref>{{LT1|VIII}}, pp. 192-5</ref><ref>{{LT1|IX}}</ref>
